text: Ðis is seo boc æt meone.
Ðis synt þa landgemera to Meone.
Þara æahta hida æræst þær Seolesburna sliht on Meone.
Of weawan ðorne on crute brace leage.
Of þære leage on scyteres flodan.
Of þam mere on ðone twisledan beam.
Of þam twisledan beame on ceorla geat of ceorla geate on ðone hagan æt hæð burge dene &lang mearce on þa twisledan ac of þære æc andlang dene on coggan beam of coggan beame on wytleahe.
Of wytleage to brunes hamme of brunes hamme andlang mearce to read lefan becan.
Andlang mearce on cealf hanggran of þam hanggran on þorn wic.
Of ðam ðorne to lyne stede of lyne stede on mearc beorh of þam beorge on ðone stapol.
Of ðam clenan forda & lang seolesburnan eft ut on Meone.
